document_data.name: Zress Orlezziir
document_data.mainbody: '''Zress Orlezziir''' was the bodyguard of [[Vlonwelv Auvryndar]] of [[House Auvryndar]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Zress was totally devoted to Vlonwelv.
document_data.Activities: She was usually in the main temple together with Vlonwelv, or in Vlonwelv's private apartments.
document_data.Relationship: Zress was always at the side of Vlonwelv, together with her [[yochlol]] advisor [[Chalizana]]. Vlonwelv trusted Zress more than her children.
document_data.History: When [[House Orlezziir]] was destroyed, Zress was adopted by Vlonwelv. She remained by her side at all times thereafter.
